ComicInfo.Summary:
Tardos Mors, Jeddak of Helium sends Dejah Thoris on a scientific mission to chart air currents and atmospheric density tests. But Dekana Lor, Headmistress of the Royal Academy of Helium hints at a second secret mission to the princess. And who is this handsome Red Martian prince and why is he suddenly part of the team?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike McKone | 1 | B | Cover B | Diego Galindo | 2 | C | Cover C | Pasquale Qualano | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 5 |
